com.ccc.deeplearning.nn

Class BaseNeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccc.deeplearning.nn.BaseNeuralNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeuralNetwork, Persistable, Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenoisingAutoEncoder, RBM

    public abstract class BaseNeuralNetwork
extends Object
implements NeuralNetwork, Persistable
    Baseline class for any Neural Network used as a layer in a deep network such as an DBN
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • nVisible

        public int nVisible

      • nHidden

        public int nHidden
        Number of hidden units One tip with this is usually having more hidden units than inputs (read: input rows here) will typically cause terrible overfitting. Another rule worthy of note: more training data typically results in more redundant data. It is usually a better idea to use a smaller number of hidden units.

        public org.jblas.DoubleMatrix W

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseNeuralNetwork

        public BaseNeuralNetwork()

      • BaseNeuralNetwork

        public BaseNeuralNetwork(int nVisible,
                 int nHidden,
                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix W,
                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix hbias,
                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vbias,
                 org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                 double fanIn)
        Parameters:
        nVisible - the number of outbound nodes
        nHidden - the number of nodes in the hidden layer
        W - the weights for this vector, maybe null, if so this will create a matrix with nHidden x nVisible dimensions.
        hBias - the hidden bias
        vBias - the visible bias (usually b for the output layer)
        rng - the rng, if not a seed of 1234 is used.

      • BaseNeuralNetwork

        public BaseNeuralNetwork(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix input,
                 int nVisible,
                 int nHidden,
                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix W,
                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix hbias,
                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vbias,
                 org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                 double fanIn,
                 org.apache.commons.math3.distribution.RealDistribution dist)
        Parameters:
        input - the input examples
        nVisible - the number of outbound nodes
        nHidden - the number of nodes in the hidden layer
        W - the weights for this vector, maybe null, if so this will create a matrix with nHidden x nVisible dimensions.
        hBias - the hidden bias
        vBias - the visible bias (usually b for the output layer)
        rng - the rng, if not a seed of 1234 is used.

        public void merge(NeuralNetwork network,
         int batchSize)
        Description copied from interface: NeuralNetwork
        Performs a network merge in the form of a += b - a / n where a is a matrix here b is a matrix on the incoming network and n is the batch size
        Specified by:
        merge in interface NeuralNetwork
        Parameters:
        network - the network to merge with
        batchSize - the batch size (number of training examples) to average by

      • getReConstructionCrossEntropy

        public double getReConstructionCrossEntropy()
        Reconstruction entropy. This compares the similarity of two probability distributions, in this case that would be the input and the reconstructed input with gaussian noise. This will account for either regularization or none depending on the configuration.
        Specified by:
        getReConstructionCrossEntropy in interface NeuralNetwork
        Returns:
        reconstruction error

      • reconstruct

        public abstract org.jblas.DoubleMatrix reconstruct(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix x)
        All neural networks are based on this idea of minimizing reconstruction error. Both RBMs and Denoising AutoEncoders have a component for reconstructing, ala different implementations.
        Parameters:
        x - the input to reconstruct
        Returns:
        the reconstructed input
